Text: smubetas Tailgating today Cc Hey guys As you know today is the home opener of SMUs season and we play rival TCU Betas on campus will be tailgating on The Boulevard If any of you saw us last year we will be farther north than that closer to the turn at the top Sorry for the vague description hopefully next week well have a map up along with the rest of the alumni site on beta Come find us and have a burger and a beer if youre planning on going to the game Andrew Carty Alumni Chair Yahoo Groups Sponsor FREE COLLEGE MONEY CLICK HERE to search scholarships cccBmCAAySSFAAVkqlBTM At Homecoming the BETA TENT had the biggest crowd by far Stay connected and consider a future homecoming BETA reunion Its incredibleforget the years in betweeneveryone just seems to pick it up right where they left off years ago Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms
